incidents.name: A2P 10DLC Campaign Vetting Delays

incident_updates.body: We are currently facing delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: BIs with incorrect country code metadata resulting in incorrect invoice for December 2022 month end

incident_updates.body: On January 4th, during a planned BI update to resolve detected configuration issues, 835 BIs were misconfigured. The Month End for December usage was run on January 5th, during which metadata which had been changed during this configuration event was used to produce invoices for 89,097 accounts. The misconfiguration led to invoices assigning BIs to incorrect countries. This led to 5 customer contacts, with some customers delaying paying their invoices pending an updated invoice. The issue was escalated to engineering on January 25th as a single customer incident. Further triage identified the breadth of the problem and causes by February 2nd. The issue was resolved when revised invoices were sent to 5497 Invoiced customers and 6,357 PAYG customers that are configured to have invoices emailed to them on February 6th.

incidents.name: Spike In Offline WhatsApp Numbers

incidents.name: Degradation of Outbound Call Answer Rates

incident_updates.body: Lower/no attestation signing for outgoing calls has been resolved and attestation signing is operating normally at this time.

Attestation signing for outgoing calls is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue in call degradation impacting outbound call answer rates. End users receiving voice calls may not be signed, thus calls may not be rightly attested, calls would still complete without issues. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with outbound voice call answer rates. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
